contentAbout.company: The IMV EOOD company was created due to the need of our customers for construction, consulting, solving various production problems. With our team, we cover a wide range of industries. We develop and implement various modern and proven solutions depending on customer requirements and problems. We keep up with the most modern software for designing, developing and testing the products before they go into production. We pay special attention to the small and large pebbles in our path and in the path of our customers.
contentAbout.experience: Our team includes specialists in various fields. With them we manage to cover a wide range of industries in our market. We also work successfully with companies located from the USA to Japan and from Germany to South Africa. In solving problems, we consult the world leaders in the relevant field. We rely enormously on the experience of previous generations, but also on the fire of the present. With our team, we always find a way out even in the most difficult situations. An outlet that allows our customers to be calm about their business and their future.
contentAbout.partner: We work with the biggest specialists both on our and on the international market. We have specialist turners, millers, welders, locksmiths, painters, auto specialists and much more. We have partners in all fields - automation, robotics, electrical equipment, programming and in any field you need.
